errorHandlingConfig.description: Settings that determine how Amazon AppFlow handles an error when placing data in the custom connector as destination. See Error Handling Config for more details.

idFieldNames.description: Name of the field that Amazon AppFlow uses as an ID when performing a write operation such as update, delete, or upsert.

objectPath.description: Object path specified in the SAPOData flow destination.

successResponseHandlingConfig.description: Determines how Amazon AppFlow handles the success response that it gets from the connector after placing data. See Success Response Handling Config for more details.

writeOperationType.description: Type of write operation to be performed in the custom connector when it's used as destination. Valid values are `INSERT`, `UPSERT`, `UPDATE`, and `DELETE`.
